column4: Does anyone know how to grow the ext3 volume? I got both windows and ubuntu installed. Want to divert some windows space over to ubuntu.
ext3 can only be expanded backwards (foot can move, head can't).  Depending on the size of your partitions, you can manuever it around and get it to work if you're moving the head though
How much space you looking to give Ubuntu?  And how much space (actual space, not just partition size) is it already using?
and how much space is Ubuntu currently using?  (Less than 10?)
